Html:
Has anyone tried to logout from pages other than the default.aspx when logged in a admin?

I created an issue, I would be interested if this is common to all installtions.
Please reply and vote in issue tracker so we can get this prioritzed.

Thanks

The "log off" button on the home pages works because it returns to \default.aspx

All other "logout" buttons are returning to \{currentpage}.aspx but they all have folders i.e. \events\calendar.aspx.

Returns error resource not found \calendar.aspx......
